songs.title: Steal my girl - live acoustic session
songs.lyrics:
[Zayn]
She's been my queen since we were sixteen
We want the same things
We dream the same dreams
Alright, alright?
I got it all cause she is the one
Her mom calls me love
Her dad calls me son
Alright, alright

[Niall]
I know, I know, I know for sure

[All]
Everybody want to steal my girl
Everybody want to take her heart away
Couple billion in the whole wide world
Find another one cause she belongs to me
Everybody want to steal my girl
Everybody want to take her heart away
Couple billion in the whole wide world
Find another one cause she belongs to me

[All (Liam)]
Na na na na na na na, na na na na na na na (oh yeah)
Na na na na na na na, na na na na na na na (oh yeah)

She belongs to me

[Liam]
Kisses like a queen, her walk is so lean
And every jaw drops when she's in those jeans
Alright, alright?

[Louis]
I don't exist if I don't love her
The sun doesn't shine, the world doesn't turn
Alright, alright?

[Niall]
I know, I know, I know for sure

[Zayn]
Everybody want to steal my girl
Everybody want to take her heart away
Couple billion in the whole wide world
Find another one cause she belongs to me

Everybody want to steal my girl
Everybody want to take her heart away
Couple billion in the whole wide world
Find another one cause she belongs to me

[All (Liam)]
Na na na na na na na, na na na na na na na (oh yeah)
Na na na na na na na, na na na na na na na (oh yeah)

[Harry]
She knows, she knows that I never let her down before
She know, she knows that I'm never gonna let another take her love from me now

[All]
Everybody want to steal my girl
Everybody want to take her heart away
Couple billion in the whole wide world
Find another one cause she belongs to me

Na na na na na na na, na na na na na na na (oh yeah)
Na na na na na na na, na na na na na na na (oh yeah)

She belongs to me

Na na na na na na na, na na na na na na na (oh yeah)
Na na na na na na na, na na na na na na na (oh yeah)

She belongs to me
